kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'ff' to base url 'about:blank'.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening url 'https://www.gogoro.com/tw/'

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//li[@class='ggr-nav-item ggr-nav-item--logo gc-desktop-visible']//a[@class='nav-logo nav-logo--dark'][contains(text(),'Gogoro')]'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//li[@class='ggr-nav-item ggr-nav-item--logo gc-desktop-visible']//a[@class='nav-logo nav-logo--dark'][contains(text(),'Gogoro')]' contains exact text 'Gogoro'.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

test.name: Landing LOGIN Page

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//li[@class='ggr-nav-item ggr-nav-item--secondary ggr-nav-item--login gc-desktop-visible']//a[@class='ggr-nav-link nav-list__link nav-list__link--login nav-list__link--dark'][contains(text(),'登入')]'.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.
kw.msg: NoSuchWindowException: Message: Browsing context has been discarded

NoSuchWindowException: Message: Browsing context has been discarded
